verses.verse: With songs and honors sounding loud, Address the Lord on high; Over the heavens He spreads His cloud, And waters veil the sky.
He sends His showers of blessing down To cheer the plains below; He makes the grass the mountains crown, And corning valleys grow.
His steady counsels change the face Of the declining year; He bids the sun cut short his race, And wintry days appear.
The changing wind, the flying cloud, Obey His mighty word: With songs and honors sounding loud Praise ye the sovereign Lord!
